ya2.2.2:1.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:2.1: Asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhati. Pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.

ya2.2.2:104.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhati,
ya2.2.2:104.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ
ya2.2.2:104.1_2: tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:105.1: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:106.1_0: Pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no
ya2.2.2:106.1_1: ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhati. Pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
ya2.2.2:107.1: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:108.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho
ya2.2.2:108.1_1: nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
ya2.2.2:109.1: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:110.1_0: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:110.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati. Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ
ya2.2.2:110.1_2: tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:111.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:112.1_0: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca
ya2.2.2:112.1_1: tesaṁ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca
ya2.2.2:112.1_2: na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:113.1: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:114.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ rūpakkhandho
ya2.2.2:114.1_1: na nirujjhati. Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:115.1: Yassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:116.1: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:118.1: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:119.1_0: Pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati, no
ya2.2.2:119.1_1: ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ
ya2.2.2:119.1_2: upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:120.1: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:121.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na
ya2.2.2:121.1_1: nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati. Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ
ya2.2.2:121.1_2: asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:122.1: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:123.1_0: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati,
ya2.2.2:123.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
ya2.2.2:123.1_2: ca na nirujjhati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:124.1: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:125.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
ya2.2.2:125.1_1: na nirujjhati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:126.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:127.1: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:128.1: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.2:129.1: Yassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:130.1: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ saññākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:131.1: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.2:133.1: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:134.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha,
ya2.2.2:134.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
ya2.2.2:134.1_2: rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:135.1: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:136.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no
ya2.2.2:136.1_1: ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
ya2.2.2:137.1: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:138.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho
ya2.2.2:138.1_1: nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
ya2.2.2:139.1: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:140.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ
ya2.2.2:140.1_1: tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha. Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
ya2.2.2:140.1_2: saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:141.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.2:142.1: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:143.1: Yassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.2:144.1: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:146.1: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:147.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha, no
ya2.2.2:147.1_1: ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe
ya2.2.2:147.1_2: parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhittha, vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:148.1: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:149.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:149.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe
ya2.2.2:149.1_2: parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:150.1: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:151.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ
ya2.2.2:151.1_1: tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ
ya2.2.2:151.1_2: tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.

ya2.2.2:153.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
ya2.2.2:153.1_1: na nirujjhittha. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho
ya2.2.2:153.1_2: ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhittha.
